Parlan asked me to help him with his research, but his request is slightly insane. He wants me, ME, to bring him some ghilliedhu roots.

I can barely weed a garden, I'm not about to go toe-to-toe with a growling, walking tree. Could you go into the northern Bestial Vale and collect roots from {@LinkCreature:3#3#Mossy Ghilliedhus}?

You're a lifesaver, !

This is just what Parlan wants. Would you mind taking them to him? I've some notes to finish on some other flora.
I'm pretty sure Parlan only wants roots from {@LinkCreature:3#3#Mossy Ghilliedhus}. I doubt I could fool him with a substitute.

! Good to see you again. And you brought ghilliedhu roots? Excellent!

It's all part of my elixir research. It's dangerous, I know, but a priest or mystic isn't always around to save the fallen. A potion that could do it would be a treasure beyond price for the Valkyon Federation!
